inputs.name: codeDxUrl
inputs.label: URL to Code Dx server
inputs.helpMarkDown: Enter the URL of your Code Dx server; The build server must have access to this URL

inputs.name: projectId
inputs.label: Project ID
inputs.helpMarkDown: Enter the project ID of your Code Dx project

inputs.name: apiKey
inputs.label: API key
inputs.helpMarkDown: Enter your Code Dx API key

inputs.name: filePaths
inputs.label: Files to upload
inputs.helpMarkDown: Enter the paths of files to upload; place multiple files on separate lines
